titleStmt.title: Religion and reason mutually corresponding and assisting each other first essay : a reply to the vindicative answer lately publisht against a letter, in which the sence of a bull and council concerning the duration of purgatory was discust / by Thomas White, Gent.
titleStmt.author: White, Thomas, 1593-1676.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
